verses.roman:
śiṣya-gaṇa lañā punaḥ vidyāra vilāsa
vidyā-bale sabā jini' auddhatya prakāśa

synonyms: śiṣya-gaṇa—disciples; lañā—taking; punaḥ—again; vidyāra—of education; vilāsa—pastime; vidyā-bale—by the strength of education; saba—everyone; jini'-conquering; auddhatya—of pride; prakāśa—manifestation.
translation: After coming back from East Bengal, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu again began educating others. By the strength of His education He conquered everyone, and thus He was greatly proud.
